import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update a tag"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tags/{TagId}/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing tag by TagId, allowing legacy integrations to change the display name or tag type and adjust scope metadata.

**Prerequisites**
1. **TagId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/tags/query](/docs/api/tags/get-tags-by-query) or [GET /api/v1.0/tags/of/type/\{tagTypeId\}](/docs/api/tags/get-tags-by-type) to locate a tag and extract `Items[].TagId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify the tag to edit using [GET /api/v1.0/tags/query](/docs/api/tags/get-tags-by-query).
2. Submit [PUT /api/v1.0/tags/\{TagId\}/update](/docs/api/tags/update-tag) with the new name/type values.

**Minimal Required Fields**: TagId (path), Name, TagTypeId

**Note**: This API is deprecated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"TagId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier for the tag to update","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for creating or updating a tag.","properties":{"TagId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the tag. Required for updates, generated on create if not provided."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name for the tag"},"TagTypeId":{"type":"integer","description":"Type identifier for the tag (e.g., asset tag, ticket tag)"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Site scope for the tag. Null for district-wide tags."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Product association for the tag"},"ScopeId":{"type":"string","description":"Scope identifier for the tag"}},"required":["Name","TagTypeId"],"title":"UpdateTagRequest"},"example":{"Name":"Updated Tag Name","TagTypeId":1}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
